snippet.title: Looper Tactics | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Looper Tactics is a strategic RPG game that blends deck-building with tabletop board game elements. In this game, you'll embark on an exploration across a chessboard-style map, and upgrade your deck through battles, events, and treasure hunts to prepare for the ultimate boss challenge.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2140850/Looper_Tactics/
